include/physicalmodels/numa2d.h

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /*
00002  *
00003  * 2D Nonhydrostatic Unified Model of the Atmosphere (NUMA)
00004  *
00005  * References:
00006  *
00007  * F.X. Giraldo, M. Restelli, and M. Laeuter, "Semi-Implicit 
00008  * Formulations of the Euler Equations: Applications to 
00009  * Nonhydrostatic Atmospheric Modeling", SIAM J. Sci. Comp., 
00010  * Vol. 32, 3394-3425 (2010)
00011  *
00012  * N. Ahmad and J. Lindeman, "Euler solutions using flux-based wave 
00013  * decomposition", Intl. J. Num. Method. Fluid., Vol. 54 (1), 
00014  * 47-72 (2007)
00015  *
00016 */
00017 
00018 #include <basic.h>
00019 #include <mathfunctions.h>
00020 
00021 #define _NUMA2D_ "numa2d"
00022 
00023 /* define ndims and nvars for this model */
00024 #undef _MODEL_NDIMS_
00025 #undef _MODEL_NVARS_
00026 #define _MODEL_NDIMS_ 2
00027 #define _MODEL_NVARS_ 4
00028 
00029 /* grid directions */
00030 #define _XDIR_ 0
00031 #define _YDIR_ 1
00032 
00033 #define _Numa2DGetFlowVars_(u,drho,uvel,vvel,dT,rho0) \
00034   { \
00035     drho = u[0]; \
00036     uvel = u[1]/(rho0+drho); \
00037     vvel = u[2]/(rho0+drho); \
00038     dT   = u[3]; \
00039   }
00040 
00041 #define _Numa2DSetFlux_(f,dir,drho,uvel,vvel,dT,dP,rho0,T0) \
00042   { \
00043     if (dir == _XDIR_) { \
00044       f[0] = (rho0+drho) * uvel; \
00045       f[1] = (rho0+drho)*uvel*uvel + dP; \
00046       f[2] = (rho0+drho)*uvel*vvel; \
00047       f[3] = uvel*(dT+T0); \
00048     } else if (dir == _YDIR_) { \
00049       f[0] = (rho0+drho) * vvel; \
00050       f[1] = (rho0+drho)*uvel*vvel; \
00051       f[2] = (rho0+drho)*vvel*vvel + dP; \
00052       f[3] = vvel*(dT+T0); \
00053     } \
00054   }
00055 
00056 #define _Numa2DSetLinearFlux_(f,dir,drho,uvel,vvel,dT,dP,rho0,T0) \
00057   { \
00058     if (dir == _XDIR_) { \
00059       f[0] = (rho0+drho) * uvel; \
00060       f[1] = dP; \
00061       f[2] = 0.0; \
00062       f[3] = (rho0+drho)*uvel*T0/rho0; \
00063     } else if (dir == _YDIR_) { \
00064       f[0] = (rho0+drho) * vvel; \
00065       f[1] = 0.0; \
00066       f[2] = dP; \
00067       f[3] = (rho0+drho)*vvel*T0/rho0; \
00068     } \
00069   }
00070 
00071 #define _Numa2DSetSource_(s,param,drho) \
00072   { \
00073     s[0] =  0.0; \
00074     s[1] =  0.0; \
00075     s[2] = -param->g*drho; \
00076     s[3] =  0.0; \
00077   }
00078 
00079 #define _Numa2DComputePressure_(params,T0,dT,P0,dP) \
00080   { \
00081     double gamma    = params->gamma; \
00082     double Pref     = params->Pref; \
00083     double R        = params->R; \
00084     double P_total  = Pref * raiseto((R*(T0+dT)/Pref),gamma); \
00085     dP  = P_total - P0; \
00086   }
00087 
00088 #define _Numa2DComputeLinearizedPressure_(params,T0,dT,P0,dP) \
00089   { \
00090     double gamma    = params->gamma; \
00091     dP  = (gamma*P0/T0) * dT; \
00092   }
00093 
00094 #define _Numa2DComputeTemperature_(rho0,drho,T0,dT,temperature) \
00095   { \
00096     temperature = (T0+dT)*EP/(rho0+drho); \
00097   }
00098 
00099 #define _Numa2DComputeSpeedofSound_(gamma,R,T0,dT,rho0,drho,EP,c) \
00100   { \
00101     c = sqrt(gamma*R*(T0+dT)*EP/(rho0+drho)); \
00102   }
00103 
00104 #define _Numa2DComputeLinearizedSpeedofSound_(gamma,R,T0,rho0,EP,c) \
00105   { \
00106     c = sqrt(gamma*R*T0*EP/rho0); \
00107   }
00108 
00109 typedef struct numa2d_parameters {
00110   double  gamma;      /* Ratio of heat capacities         */
00111   double  R;          /* Universal gas constant           */
00112   double  g;          /* acceleration due to gravity      */
00113   int     init_atmos; /* choice of initial atmosphere     */
00114   double  mu;         /* coefficient of dynamic viscosity */
00115 
00116   /* pressure & temperature at zero altitude */
00117   double Pref, Tref;
00118 
00119   /* function to calculate hydrostatically balanced flow variables */
00120   void (*StandardAtmosphere)(void*,double,double*,double*,double*,double*);
00121 
00122   /* choice of upwinding scheme */
00123   char upwind[_MAX_STRING_SIZE_];
00124 } Numa2D;
00125 
00126 int Numa2DInitialize (void*,void*);
00127 int Numa2DCleanup    (void*);
00128 
00129 /* Available upwinding schemes */
00130 #define _RUSANOV_UPWINDING_ "rusanov"
